title: Allow WSL root folder location to be in a separate EXT4 partition recognized by windows
body: The idea is basically allowing the user to actually play with the files in a GUI environment with all the added perks of an explorer window.

comments.body: Would recommend combining this with wsl being inside a vhd file by default.

Already a UserVoice for adding support for Ext4. Also another Uservoice and issue for installing distros somewhere other than the boot drive. Vote for those instead. They do the work for those, you get your ask.
